import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Input from '../../components/Input'; import PageHeader from '../../components/PageHeader'; import './styles.css'; import warningIcon from '../../assets/images/icons/warning.svg'; import Textarea from '../../components/Textarea'; import Select from '../../components/Select'; function TeacherForm() { const scheduleItems = useState( [ { week_day: 0, from: '8:00 AM', to: '16:00 PM' }, { week_day: 1, from: '8:00 AM', to: '16:00 PM' }]) function newScheduleItem() { scheduleItems.push({ week_day: 0, from: '', to: '' }) } return (
